casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Patrick RYAN 366A10-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2018 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, William F. Massengale, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Ryan, Michael Patrick. Kelvin Atkinson, Assistant District Attorney, Joan M. Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Locke Bell, Attorney at Law, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

William Stevenson, Assistant District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the Second Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of November 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of November 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of December 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
